wikipedia_page.main: David Adams (1845–1922) of Cardiganshire, Wales was a Congregationalist minister and schoolmaster. He promoted temperance, and stressed the ethical rather than the controversial aspects of Christianity. His published works include Paul yng Ngoleuni'r Iesu (1897) and Yr Eglwys a Gwareiddiad Diweddar (1914).
